reviewText:
This is a very straightforward Mexican shoot-'em-up, with LOTS of action, right out of the gate, and so many bullets fired you can practically taste metal in your mouth.

Hugo Stiglitz plays the hard-as-drop-forged-steel captain of an elite SWAT-style police unit, and the movie's narrative deals with his squad's efforts to defeat a group of bad guys who have taken over a bus full of hostages. The conclusion has few surprises, but it's action-packed and that's what you expect from a movie like this.

You gets what you pays for...
